Text:
Thank you ! All your post are great from now !

I expect some other GREAT TARKOVSKI masterwork !

I've seeded :

- Stalker with more than 100Go
- Mirror with more than 30Go

Just put this to tell that - even if I do not have much DVD - I try to help at best to participate to this great campaign of Classics !

Best regards,
and HAPPY NEW YEAR !
